name: Crasher (itch) (browndragon)
description:
You're the circle. It follows your mouse. Click for a burst of speed (but it's limited in time!).

Bounce stars into rectangles for points; don't bump into the rectangles (which removes points). 

> Protip: Bouncing a star into a rectangle is worth more points based on how crowded the field is!

Game ends when you run out of points or after 100 rectangles spawn -- and remember, they spawn faster as you play!

> Protip: the center of the field has strong wind, which blows everything on it to- and fro.
